A lazy intern reused a prime when generating keys for RSA-encrypted messages. Can you recover the secret from this ciphertext? 227193762487004093189146677928466971403503610749731219217936270164735000402337812179363170382384070243877643925590340385169750697420798344353405762797693924347426515241434407411412532672344154591918586515412180634573960244336438742

The flag format is flag{...}
n=406400029438205215949777600830046486971214336560151157266449794223577083975344641624888910272726150038032112601346499887047996468094273595390165247859202484099659592944424104654819591282338509835925686237642404753583012850716002281, e=319348518297155598162179228163435096075808549693631943055266722411139031496843521520708583335140358257052373264898621912897328842468069773343944323250802301693477518528356375121725468591514314692868840520303885318299078541001201585

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{wlcyjpya}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 227193762487004093189146677928466971403503610749731219217936270164735000402337812179363170382384070243877643925590340385169750697420798344353405762797693924347426515241434407411412532672344154591918586515412180634573960244336438742
vulnerability: repeated primes
hint: The RSA modulus n is a perfect square. This often indicates a repeated prime usage vulnerability.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=406400029438205215949777600830046486971214336560151157266449794223577083975344641624888910272726150038032112601346499887047996468094273595390165247859202484099659592944424104654819591282338509835925686237642404753583012850716002281, e=319348518297155598162179228163435096075808549693631943055266722411139031496843521520708583335140358257052373264898621912897328842468069773343944323250802301693477518528356375121725468591514314692868840520303885318299078541001201585
extra_info: p=20159365799503842922219592567346907651735176001671607253721908410458960821116056044673496204818226808256399018532909, q=20159365799503842922219592567346907651735176001671607253721908410458960821116056044673496204818226808256399018532909, Ï†(n)=406400029438205215949777600830046486971214336560151157266449794223577083975344641624888910272726150038032112601346459568316397460408429156205030554043899013747656249729916660837998673360696277723836339245232768299966500052678936464
subtype: repeated_prime_usage
archetype: rsa
